document_data.name: ''Turgat's Revene''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Turgat's Revene''''' was a work of fiction, a swashbuckling adventure [[book]].
document_data.Contents: This novel tells grand adventure on the high seas story of the Captain Samuel Turgat and his sidekick Doctor Algernon.
document_data.History:
In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''Turgat's Revene'' could be found in the city of Daggerford, notably in the city's open library within [[Sorceller's Encapsulate]].

This book inspired a young librarian to legally change his name to [[Samuel Turgat]] and take on a new profession of a the ''[[Flyingfish]]'' captain.
